text: Today on the West Coast, itâ€™s a bit of a bummer with 5 ft @7s S swell and fresh 32 mph S winds making it blown out. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with 6 ft @9s W swell, but still messy due to 24 mph SSW winds. The day after, conditions finally clean up with 7 ft @10s WNW swell and light 8 mph SW winds, offering some fun surf at spots like Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay. Best: day after.
